Title: CEO
Text: Place 2 counters instead of 1 with your default action.

Title: CTO
Text: Place 3 counters on TECH Tickets instead of 1 with your default action.

Title: Office Manager
Text: Draw 2 cards instead of 1 at upkeep, then put one of them on top or the bottom of the Player Deck.
Notes: This is very experimental, probably will do something else with it instead.

Title: Manager
Text: You decide the order of card actions on your turn.
Notes: Need to determine the canonic effect resolution order.

Title: Lead SWE
Text: Discard 2 cards to pull Refactoring from discard pile (discard 3 to pull Heavy Refactoring).

Title: Generalist
Text: Place +1 counter for every 2 Markets currently featured in the Product.
Notes: Define upkeep strictly in the rules, it should only point to drawing a card from the Player Deck at the beginning of a turn.
